workers.commandLine: python $rootdir/train.py $rootdir/$datadir -s src -t tgt --max-tokens 4000 -a $arch --share-all-embeddings --dropout 0.3838412441154259 --optimizer adam --adam-betas '(0.9, 0.98)' --clip-norm 0.02058184065243851 --weight-decay 0.0003126546033781752 --lr 0.0006478589395952905 --lr-scheduler fixed --warmup-updates 24723 --min-lr 1e-09 --criterion label_smoothed_cross_entropy --label-smoothing 0.05499488203874843 --max-update 350000 --max-epoch 10 --save-dir $PHILLY_JOB_DIRECTORY
